sil-desc: A [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org Semantic MediaWiki] extension to create and manage interlanguage links
smw-pa-property-predefined__sil_containe: "$1" is a predefined property that represents a container entity to describe interlanguage link related information and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Interlanguage_Links Semantic Interlanguage Links] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sil_ill_lang: "$1" is a predefined property that contains an annotated language code and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Interlanguage_Links Semantic Interlanguage Links] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sil_ill_ref: "$1" is a predefined property that contains an arbitrary reference and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Interlanguage_Links Semantic Interlanguage Links] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined-long__sil_ill: Entities with the same reference are interlinked and expected to represent similar content in different languages.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sil_iwl_lang: "$1" is a predefined property and represents a language code derived from an interwiki link and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Interlanguage_Links Semantic Interlanguage Links] extension.
smw-pa-property-predefined__sil_iwl_ref: "$1" is a predefined property and represents a target page derived from an interwiki link and is provided by the [https://www.semantic-mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:Semantic_Interlanguage_Links Semantic Interlanguage Links] extension.
sil-interlanguagelink-hideinterlanguagel: The parser function cannot be used because $wgHideInterlanguageLinks is set.
sil-interlanguagelink-invalidlanguagecod: "$1" was not recognized as valid language code.
sil-interlanguagelink-multiplecalls-diff: The parser function was called multiple times but with a different language code ("$1") which is to be avoided as content of a page is generally expected to be represented by a single language.
sil-interlanguagelink-languagetargetcomb: The combination "$1":"$2" already exists for page "$3" therefore no additional interlanguage annotation was created.
sil-interlanguagelist-missing-linkrefere: The parser function is missing a valid reference.
sil-interlanguagelist-missing-template: The parser function is missing an output template.
sil-interlanguageparser-linkreference-er: The parser function had a problem to create a title object from "$1".
sil-categorypage-languagefilter-active: This category contains information (page, subcategory, and image) that is filtered by "$1" language.
